actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to remove the study and recommendation of pay increases for members of Congress from the jurisdiction of the Citizens' Commission on Public Service and Compensation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to remove the authority of the Citizens' Commission on Public Service and Compensation to review the pay rates of Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to remove the study and recommendation of pay increases for members of Congress from the jurisdiction of the Citizens' Commission on Public Service and Compensation, and for other purposes.
